member.name: T:Aquaforest.OCR.Definitions.StatusUpdateEventArgs
member.summary: This class contains information relating to the conversion status of a page.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.OCR.Definitions.StatusUpdateEventArgs.ConfidenceScore
member.summary: Gets the confidence score. Generally a value of 1 or greater would indicate reasonable OCR of a page, but this should be confirmed using "typical" source files.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.OCR.Definitions.StatusUpdateEventArgs.Sc1
member.summary: Autorotate heuristic score 1

member.name: P:Aquaforest.OCR.Definitions.StatusUpdateEventArgs.Sc2
member.summary: Autorotate heuristic score 2

member.name: P:Aquaforest.OCR.Definitions.StatusUpdateEventArgs.Sc3
member.summary: Autorotate heuristic score 3

member.name: P:Aquaforest.OCR.Definitions.StatusUpdateEventArgs.Sc4
member.summary: Autorotate heuristic score 4

member.name: P:Aquaforest.OCR.Definitions.StatusUpdateEventArgs.Sc5
member.summary: Autorotate heuristic score 5

member.name: P:Aquaforest.OCR.Definitions.StatusUpdateEventArgs.Rotation
member.summary: A value from 0 to 3 which indicates the rotation used for the output in terms of the number of 90Â° steps away from the orientation in which the input page was provided. If Autorotate is set to false this will always be 0.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.OCR.Definitions.StatusUpdateEventArgs.PageNumber
member.summary: This property returns page for which the object relates to.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.OCR.Definitions.StatusUpdateEventArgs.TextAvailable
member.summary: This property indicates whether text was extracted for the page.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.OCR.Definitions.StatusUpdateEventArgs.ImageAvailable
member.summary: This property indicates whether an image (after all appropriate pre-processing) was successfully extracted.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.OCR.Definitions.StatusUpdateEventArgs.BlankPage
member.summary: This property indicates whether the page was detected as blank.
